post:
Hello LET,

As usual, we are back again with another unbeatable offer to share with the community. There will be limited stock on these so grab them before they run out! 

We are a fast growing, high-performance, low-end provider that continuously raises the bar offering OpenVZ and KVM VPS with unmatched pricing while sustaining service quality. Deploy a large scale diverse network within our 5 locations! 

**Key Features**
- 2.x/3.x Kernels
- Docker supported 
- FUSE Support
- IPv6 Capable (LA-QN Only)
- DDoS Protection (3Gbps) (LA-QN Only)
- SolusVM Control Panel (Reinstall, Start, Stop, Tun/Tap, Root Pass, Statistics)
- 24/7 Support
- Bulk pricing discounts
- Private node clusters available
- Reseller VPS program

**The Deal:**

**Choose 3 year subscription and receive FREE double upgrades on CPU, Ram, Disk, and Bandwidth! (4 vCPU, 8GB Ram, 40GB SSD, 8TB Bandwidth)**

2 vCore
4GB Memory
20GB Pure SSD 
4TB Bandwidth per Month
+DDoS Protection
1Gbps Port
1 x IP Address
$14.99/annual
$44.97/triennial (**DOUBLE ALL RESOURCES FREE!**)
Order: [https://my.hiformance.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=245](https://my.hiformance.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=245)

**Node Configuration**
CPU's: E3-1240v6, E3-1270v2, Dual X5650, Dual E5-2660v2
Mem: 32-128G
Disk: 4x1 or 4x2TB SSD RAID10
